official_title: To change election day for Federal offices to the first Monday in November and to make election day a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to: (1) change election day for Federal offices to the first Monday in November; and (2) make election day a legal public holiday.

titles.title: To change election day for Federal offices to the first Monday in November and to make election day a legal public holiday.
